attributes.action: Have a section in Petitions for Family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why no section just about us ?
It could be entitled :
You and Your Community : what issues concern you about family, friends and the larger community.  Those are the types of petitions I am looking for and I dont understand why there isnt a section for this.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
